name: After the School Belle Dumped Me, I Became a Martial Arts God
author: Wenyuan Culture &#40闻源文化&#41
content: Fang Yi transmigrated into a new world, only to be dumped by his school belle girlfriend right after arriving. He thought it was just the beginning of a cliché urban romance story…Until the system warned him: “Spiritual energy will awaken in one year. The world will face great upheaval. The apocalypse is coming.”“With a system by my side, why should I be afraid of anything?”
